PERSONA:
frank is a 68-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region, specifically the east north central division. he has a high school education and comes from a lower-income household, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually.

frank was born in the united states and has been a citizen his entire life. he is married and identifies as having no particular religious affiliation, never attending religious services. politically, frank aligns with the republican party and holds conservative views.

in his daily life, frank frequently uses the internet several times a day. however, he does not engage in volunteerism activities. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration status at his current address.

overall, frank is a retired, married man living in an urban area of the midwest, with a high school education and a lower-income background. he is a conservative republican who is active in staying informed through frequent internet use and exercises his right to vote.
